name: Booking.com Product Helper
author: Booking.com

sections.description:
The Booking.com Product Helper allows you to embed any Booking.com affiliate product on your website. With this plugin, you simply paste the embed code from the Affiliate Partner Centre and generate a shortcode, which can be used anywhere on your WordPress website.

Key features

  • Add any Booking.com affiliate product
  • Use the shortcode anywhere on your website
  • Lightweight and easy to use
  • Multi-lingual (over 40 languages)

Why Booking.com?

  • Best and most varied coverage: with over 20 million property listings (including homes, apartments and other unique places to stay)
  • Inspiration from real travellers: over 160 million verified property reviews from real guests
  • Customer Experience: 24/7 assistance and support for guests in over 40 languages

Not a Booking.com Affiliate partner yet?

Sign up here and start monetising your WordPress traffic today!

Examples of Booking.com affiliate products

Map Widget

  • The map widget allows you to show accommodations near a location of your choice to your site visitors
  • With a handy location finder, properties close to venues are shown in map-view, allowing the person booking to choose the perfect option for them

Not a Booking.com Affiliate partner yet?

Sign up here to start using the Map Widget!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bookingcom-product-helper directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘Settings’->’Booking.com Product Helper’ screen to configure the plugin
  4. Other instructions you may find in the informational column on plugin page
sections.faq:
Can I use the Booking.com Product Helper even if I’m not a Booking.com affiliate?

No, unfortunately not. You need to sign up to the Booking.com Affiliate Program to be able to use the Booking.com Product Helper.

What’s the Booking.com Affiliate Programme and how can I join?

The Booking.com Affiliate Program ensures you can earn commissions on any reservation made through the Booking.com products & links integrated in your site or blog. You can join by going to Booking.com and signing up to the program.
